ComicInfo.Writer: Robert Place Napton,Karl Altstaetter,Robert Napton,Karl Altstaetter,Robert Napton
ComicInfo.Title: Untitled
ComicInfo.Summary: Untitled: Cabbot and his strike force stop The Half and capture the piece of the mystic pedestal the villain was trying to steal for Epiphany. Getting the artifact and keeping it, however, proves to be difficult as more of the Horde arrive and succeed in taking the fragment from Bloodstrike. Epiphany pieces together the entire pedestal to form the Eye of God.
